meanings.definition: A card game similar to rummy.
meanings.sent1: During family game night, we always enjoy playing cooncan together.
meanings.sent2: Let's invite our friends over to play a round of cooncan this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The cooncan tournament got so intense that we ran out of snacks!
meanings.sent4: Her strategy in cooncan was like a well-oiled machine, unstoppable and efficient.
meanings.sent5: The sound of cards shuffling and laughter filled the room as we played cooncan.

meanings.definition: To play the card game cooncan.
meanings.sent1: We should cooncan after dinner to relax and have fun.
meanings.sent2: She always cooncans with her siblings on lazy Sunday afternoons.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally cooncaned with my cards facing the wrong way, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: His mind was sharp and focused as he cooncaned his way to victory.
meanings.sent5: The friends cooncaning in the park attracted a crowd with their laughter and cheers.

meanings.definition: A player of the card game cooncan.
meanings.sent1: She is known as the cooncan champion in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The cooncan expert shared some tips with the beginners at the club.
meanings.sent3: The youngest cooncan in our group surprised us all with a winning streak.
meanings.sent4: His reputation as a skilled cooncan precedes him wherever he goes.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as the top cooncans faced off in the final round.
